articles.author: Ryan Whitwam
articles.title: Google says Gmail security is “strong and effective” as it denies major breach - Ars Technica
articles.description: Google refutes claims that all 2.5 billion Gmail users are at risk.

articles.author: John Archer
articles.title: Dolby Announces Dolby Vision 2: A New Generation Of Its Beloved HDR Picture Quality Enhancement Technology - Forbes
articles.description: Dolby Vision 2 is promised to unlock more of the potential of today’s spectacular TV technologies, as well as providing new picture quality tools for creators.
articles.content: Arguably no recent TV picture quality enhancement technology has become more well known and widely loved than the Dolby Vision high dynamic range system. Dolby Visions extra scene by scene picture in… [+10369 chars]
